participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is adventurous and open-minded, often seeking new experiences. She is introspective yet enjoys sharing her thoughts with others, especially about nature and her recent personal growth.
participant_1.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. my favorite color is orange. i've a pet fish. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is quirky and imaginative, often lost in his own thoughts. He is a little anxious but has a great sense of humor, often using it to cope with stressful situations.
participant_2.background: i faint at the sight of blood. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months.
